title: A Squirrel And The Hedgehog (North Korean Animation)
description:
I have seen the title translated in several forms. I don't know Korean 
so I don't know which is most accurate:

A squirrel and the hedgehog
Squirrels and Hedgehogs

Here is a clip from Episode 27


Contained here are episodes 1 - 24, note this series started in 1977, so 
the quality gets progressively better and better. Even episode 24 (the 
last one in this torrent) isn't nearly as good as episode 27 (the newer clip 
on you tube, so don't expect a high quality animation.

The wolves aren't not in any of these episodes. :(

Source: VCD <a href="
http://www.dprk-book.com/english/movie.php?action=view&book_id=M507&lx=Film&lx2=VCD&page=7&keyfield=title&key=" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.dprk-book.com/english/movie.php?action=view&book_id=M507&lx=Film&lx2=VCD&page=7&keyfield=title&key=</a>


The whole series is on you tube now, go watch it.

For some reason piratebay blocks links to you tube, (If i put you tube as one word, it filters it!), and it just deletes any links to it too, so go to you tubecom, and go to the channel named dprksquirrels, the whole contents of this torrent content is there, thanks whoever did that.
